course.title: The Call of Beauty
course.description: Philosophers, poets, scientists, and mathematicians have meditated on the nature and power of beauty. Beauty calls on us to educate ourselves, but also calls on us to repair the injuries of the world. Readings include Plato and Sappho; Aquinas and Lady Murasaki ; Rilke and Maya Lin today. We will study aspects of beauty such as color (e.g. "The Lady and the Unicorn" tapestries depicting the five senses) and symmetry (a book on symmetry by astrophysicist Mario Livio). Topics include the beauty of earth (e.g. the writings of environmentalist Rachel Carson) and the beauty of faces (Homer on Helen, Seamus Heaney on an unnamed soldier).
